name: Where's My Loot?
description:
Find back your items while enjoying a beautiful fantasy world listening to relaxing medieval music.

Controls:

  • Use W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys to navigate over the map (Do it while pressing SHIFT for a faster movement)
  • Drag & Drop do navigate over the map using your mouse.
  • Use mouse scroll to Zoom In/Out.

Features:

  • 100 unique items to be found.
  • Check your Inventory to see details of your items.
  • Relaxing medieval music.
  • Navigate over a beaultiful fantasy map.
  • Zoom in/out to check details on the map.
